name: Dice Invader
description:
Space invaders like shooter with a dice as character. Movement happens with A and D for left and right, you can shoot with the mouse left button, but the weapon changing is automatic, happens over a given amount of time. Your weapon's number can not exceed the remaining health (displayed in bottom left) 

Story is that this dice was once ordinary, but then gained sentinence and traveled in the multiverses. At a point he concluded world a pointless place and started destroying world, the game takes place in space where the desperate habitants of this galaxy are trying to hold you back from destroying thier entire world. 

Uploading os that I dont miss the deadline, minor problems like wave counter broke, but 5 of the 6 planned weapons are operational, all 3 enemies working fine.  Later areas and bosses arriving in the future when im not hours away from the deadline. 

Im open for ideas and suggestions!
